posts works!

{{post | json}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HomeService } from '../services/home.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-posts', templateUrl: './posts.component.html', styleUrls: ['./posts.component.scss'] }) export class PostsComponent { postList: any; constructor (private postService: HomeService ){} ngOninit(): void { this.getPostData(); } getPostData(){ this.postService.getPosts().subscribe((res: any) =>{ this.postList = res.posts; }) } }
